chart_description: This chart shows the memory page faults of Kubernetes containers measured in MiB per second. Page fault occurs when a process tries to reference a memory page that is not in its working set. This chart helps to identify memory-related issues in Kubernetes infrastructure.

dimension_descriptions.pgfault: The number of minor page faults per second, which occur when a process references a memory page that is in memory but not in its working set.
dimension_descriptions.pgmajfault: The number of major page faults per second, which occur when a process references a memory page that is not in memory and must be fetched from disk first.
